Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Presidents of the United States" series (N51), issued between 1855 and 1889 by Allen & Ginter to promote Virginia Brights Cigarettes. Full series consists of 22 cards.
